develop.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to grow or change into something bigger, stronger, or more advanced, or to make someone or something do this
develop.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Knowledge in the field of genetics has been developing very rapidly.
Corsica has developed its economy around the tourist industry.
Chicago developed into a big city in the late 1800s.
It’s hard to believe that a tree can develop from a small seed.
develop.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to design or make a new idea, product, system etc over a period of time
develop.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Scientists are developing new drugs to treat arthritis.
She should have developed her own style instead of copying him.
Researchers are developing technology for the US military.
develop.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to start to have a feeling or quality that then becomes stronger
develop.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: He had developed a certain affection for me.
It was in college that he developed a taste for (=started to like) rugby football.
The children are beginning to develop a sense of responsibility.
develop.translation[0].definitions[3].de: if you develop a skill or ability, or if it develops, it becomes stronger or more advanced
develop.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: The course is designed to help students develop their speaking skills.
develop.translation[0].definitions[4].de: if you develop a disease or illness, or if it develops, you start to have it
develop.translation[0].definitions[5].de: to begin to have a physical fault
develop.translation[0].definitions[5].ex: The oil tank had developed a small crack.
The plane developed engine trouble and was forced to land.
develop.translation[0].definitions[6].de: if a problem or difficult situation develops, it begins to happen or exist, or it gets worse
develop.translation[0].definitions[6].ex: Trouble is developing in the cities.
Regional clashes could develop into larger quarrels.
develop.translation[0].definitions[7].de: to make an argument or idea clearer, by studying it more or by speaking or writing about it in more detail
develop.translation[0].definitions[7].ex: We will develop a few of these points in the seminar.
develop.translation[0].definitions[8].de: to use land for the things that people need, for example by taking minerals out of it or by building on it
develop.translation[0].definitions[8].ex: The land was developed for low-cost housing.
develop.translation[0].definitions[9].de: to make a photograph out of a photographic film, using chemicals
develop.translation[0].definitions[9].ex: Did you ever get the pictures developed?
develop.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to grow or gradually change into a larger, stronger, or more advanced state
develop.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Once a stock market develops in the Czech Republic, the bank’s customers will be offered investment accounts.
The city developed into a major trading center.
The Pacific Rim has developed from being a satellite of Japan into an economic base of its own.
The company wants to develop its European operations.
He developed the company’s laptop market, which was a great success.
develop.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to plan and make a new product or provide a new service
develop.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: We have developed a new-generation microprocessor for our top-of-the-range computers.
It takes time to develop and market new software.
develop.translation[1].definitions[2].de: to build on land, or improve existing buildings
develop.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: The building contractor is developing a site in Piccadilly Circus.
develop.translation[1].definitions[3].de: to use a natural substance or product in order to make a profit
develop.translation[1].definitions[3].ex: The venture will explore for and develop oil and natural gas in the Sindh province of Pakistan.
develop.translation[1].definitions[4].de: to create a plan, policy, or idea
develop.translation[1].definitions[4].ex: The country must develop a viable national energy policy.
We have developed a very positive plan for the store’s future.
